title: Reminder that these are not the final changes to Kha'Zix
body:
> Kha'Zix
> Taste Their Fear (Q) 
> bonus AD increased from 110% to 120%
> Evolved Reaper Claws cooldown refund increased from 45% to 60%

This is just putting power back into Q when they took it away from him through various changes. 
This is what Meddler has to say on the final matter https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/217802217938223104/398932443823865873/unknown.png 

Dark Harvest and Duskblade are what broke Kha because his passive scales with AD now and he's going around one shotting champs with mainly his autos  through resetting his passive + Duskblade 3 times in fights.

replies.body:
The missing piece that's not included in that list:


    Unseen Threat (P)
        Bonus AD ratio :: .4 >>> .2
Meddler, please, just buff ad assassin kits and dumpster duskblade. Please.
I'm not going to say duskblade isn't too strong, but holy shit its about time this item wasn't complete garbage..

You mean since 7.14, when it got reworked and become op? Or the version before assassin update which had the mini-zed ult going on, which even tho it wasn't op, it sure as hell was still good, so no beside the true dmg that scales with lethality version, the item was good-op way more time then garbage.
The mini Zed ult version of Duskblade was pretty bad tbh.  7.14 Duskblade was completely broken tho

I remember it being good-strong and as I said below, being an armor pen item it was still built after youmuus, also remember that version was before assassin update, assassins didn't have many items for them beside the 5.22-6.22 version of maw of malmortious, so a new armor pen item was very welcomed.
The item has always been heavily outclassed by Youmuus, until recent changes from true-damage -> phys

If by outclassed you mean not built first/rushed sure, but that didn't make it a bad item, as it was most likely built after anyway being an armor pen/lethality  item, and again there was a version before the true damage one, which was good-very good and lasted way more then the period it was bad (not even thrash, that's reserved for ohmwrecker), from 6.3-6.22 with the mini zed ult vs 6.22-7.14 version with true damage.

the mini zed version was only good on a few champs, in fact it was bad more often than it was good that Riot actually had to go through cycles of Black Cleaver changes because IT was picked up far more than duskblade on assassins.

Is it possible that he could gain the burst back to his isolated Q instead of the dps variant in the future? I'm sure kha mains would take that even if it meant you had to nerf his passive down more or make it ap scaling again.
I'd prefer that any day. Burst kha was so satisfying. And I wouldn't mind lowered damage on the passive. His q feels like dogshit to use now.

Doesn't matter? You gave a very large buff to Kha for no reason. Kha is overpowered and needs nerfs because he chain proc Duskblade, his Q deals too much damage, and his R makes him effectively invincible too long.

So... we're buffing Kha's Q ***even more*** despite him winning even if you're standing in the middle of a giant minion wave and never have isolation?

Yeah, okay.

He was deleting people ***before*** Duskblade and Dark Harvest were a thing, isolation or no. His rework was just a massive buff, and honestly I'd prefer the old Kha.
